metadata.title: CVE-2014-9380 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The dissector_cvs function in dissectors/ec_cvs.c in Ettercap 0.8.1 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via apacket containing only a CVS_LOGIN signature.

criterions.comment: ettercap: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
